text: Israel Space Agency (ISA; , ) is a government agency of Israel. It oordinates all Israeli space research programmes with scientific and commercial goals. It is part of the Ministry of Science and Technology of Israel. It was established in 1983. The head of the ISA is Major Gen. (ret.) Prof. Yitzhak Ben Yisrael. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Government of Israel Category:Space agencies Category:1983 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Israel
title: Israel Space Agency
